name: Ballz (itch) (mallapp)
description:
My submission to the GMTK Game Jam 2021.

Two balls are joined together. Use the mouse to steer one, collect the good stuff with the other one. I'm sure you'll figure it out, there's not much to it.

Brace yourself for the most satisfying 60 seconds of gameplay you ever had. Lol. Seriously, thanks for trying it out.

Credits: thanks to Trevor Lentz for making his sound track "Just Move" available on OpenGameArt.org
